page.title: United States men's national under-20 soccer team

{{Infobox National football team | Name = United States Under 20 | Badge = | FIFA Trigramme = USA | Nickname = ''The Yanks''
''The Stars and Stripes''{{cite web | title=Goal.com â World Cup 2010 Preview: USA â Algeria|url=http://www.goal.com/en-gb/news/2890/world-cup-2010/2010/06/22/1989278/world-cup-2010-preview-usa-algeria | accessdate =2010-06-22 }} {{cite web | title=Newsweek |url=http://www.newsweek.com/2010/06/22/algeria-the-other-french-team.html | accessdate =2010-06-22 }} | Association = [[United States Soccer Federation|United States
Soccer Federation]] | Confederation = [[CONCACAF]] ([[North America]]) | Coach = [[Tab Ramos]] | Captain = [[Perry Kitchen]] | pattern_la1 = _usa10h| pattern_b1 = __usa10h | pattern_ra1 = _usa10h | pattern_so1 = _usa10h | leftarm1 = BB133E | body1 = E8E8E8 | rightarm1 = BB133E | pattern_sh1 = _red_stripes | shorts1 = ffffff | socks1 = ffffff | pattern_la2=_usa10a | pattern_b2=_usa10a | pattern_ra2=_usa10a| pattern_sh2 = _red_stripes | pattern_so2=_usa10a | leftarm2=002664 | body2=002664 | rightarm2=002664 | shorts2=000040 | socks2=000040| | First game = ? | Largest win = ? | Largest loss = ? }} The '''United States U-20 men's national soccer team''' is the national under-20 [[association football|soccer]] team of the [[United States|United States of America]] and is controlled by the [[United States Soccer Federation]]. The highest level of competition in which the team competes is the [[FIFA U-20 World Cup]], which is held every two years. The United States' best finish came in the [[1989 FIFA World Youth Championship]] when the U.S. beat Iraq in the quarterfinal before losing to Nigeria in overtime in the semifinal and Brazil in the third-place match. [[Steve Snow]] tied for second in the tournament with three goals. The U.S. reached the quarterfinals in 1993 but lost to Brazil. After missing out in 1995, the U.S. began a run of six consecutive qualifications in 1997, reaching the second round in five consecutive tournaments. Of those tournaments, the best U.S. performance came in 2003, when the U.S. reached the quarterfinal and led Argentina 1-0 in the final minutes before falling 2-1 in extra time. The U.S. also reached the quarterfinal of the 2007 Cup before losing 2-1 in extra time to Austria. == CONCACAF U-20 Championship Record == * '''1976:''' Third place. Won preliminary round Group 2. Finished 2nd in 2nd round Group A. Lost to Honduras in semifinal. Beat Guatemala for third place. * '''1978:''' Second round. Won 1st round Group B. Finished 4th in 2nd round Group A. * '''1980:''' Second place. Won 1st round New Jersey Group. Beat Bermuda in quarterfinal. Beat Honduras on [[Penalty shootout (association football)|penalties]] in semifinal. Lost to Mexico in final. * '''1982:''' Second place. Won 1st round Group A. Won 2nd round Group A. Beat Guatemala in semifinal. Lost to Honduras in final. Qualified when Honduras was disqualified. * '''1984:''' Fourth place. Finished 2nd in 1st round Group 2. Finished 2nd in 2nd round Group A. Lost to Mexico in semifinal. Lost to El Salvador for third place. * '''1986:''' Second place. Won Group B. Finished 2nd in final group. * '''1988:''' Third place. Finished 2nd in Group 1. Finished third in final group. Qualified when Mexico was disqualified. * '''1990:''' Third place. Won Group 3. Finished third in final group. * '''1992:''' Second place. Won Group C. Finished second in final group. * '''1994:''' First round. Finished second in Group C. * '''1996:''' Third place. Won Group 2. Finished third in final round. * '''1998:'''â  Qualified. Won Group B. * '''2001:'''â  Qualified. Finished 2nd in Group 1. * '''2003:'''â  Qualified. Finished 2nd in Group B. * '''2005:'''â  Qualified. Won Group A. * '''[[2007 CONCACAF U20 Tournament|2007]]:'''â  Qualified. Won Group A. * '''[[2009 CONCACAF U-20 Championship|2009]]:''' Runner-up and qualified to the [[2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup]]. Finished first in Group 1, ahead of [[Honduras national under-20 football team|Honduras]], [[Jamaica national under-20 football team|Jamaica]], and [[El Salvador national under-20 football team|El Salvador]]. They defeated [[Trinidad and Tobago national under-20 football team|Trinidad and Tobago]] in a [[Penalty shootout (association football)|penalty shootout]], 4–3, after a scoreless, 120-minute, regulation draw in the semifinals. In the finals the US team lost by a score of 3–0 to [[Costa Rica national under-20 football team|Costa Rica]]. * '''[[2011 CONCACAF U-20 Championship|2011]]:''' Quarterfinal. Did not qualify for World Cup. â  ''The tournament was played with a two-group, qualification format from 1998–2007. There was no championship round.'' == FIFA U-20 World Cup Record == * '''[[1977 FIFA World Youth Championship|1977]]:''' Did not qualify. * '''[[1979 FIFA World Youth Championship|1979]]:''' Did not qualify. * '''[[1981 FIFA World Youth Championship|1981]]:''' First round. 0-1-2 in group play. * '''[[1983 FIFA World Youth Championship|1983]]:''' First round. 1-0-2 in group play. * '''[[1985 FIFA World Youth Championship|1985]]:''' Did not qualify. * '''[[1987 FIFA World Youth Championship|1987]]:''' First round. 1-0-2 in group play. * '''[[1989 FIFA World Youth Championship|1989]]:''' Fourth place. Finished 2nd in Group C. Beat Iraq in quarterfinal. Lost to Nigeria in semifinal. Lost to Brazil for third place. * '''[[1991 FIFA World Youth Championship|1991]]:''' Did not qualify. * '''[[1993 FIFA World Youth Championship|1993]]:''' Quarterfinalist. Finished 2nd in Group C. Lost to Brazil in quarterfinal. * '''[[1995 FIFA World Youth Championship|1995]]:''' Did not qualify. * '''[[1997 FIFA World Youth Championship|1997]]:''' Second round. Finished 3rd in Group C. Lost to Uruguay in second round. * '''[[1999 FIFA World Youth Championship|1999]]:''' Second round. Finished 2nd in Group E. Lost to Spain in second round. * '''[[2001 FIFA World Youth Championship|2001]]:''' Second round. Finished 2nd in Group C. Lost to Egypt in second round. * '''[[2003 FIFA World Youth Championship|2003]]:''' Quarterfinalist. Won Group F. Beat CÃ´te d'Ivoire in second round. Lost to Argentina in quarterfinal. * '''[[2005 FIFA World Youth Championship|2005]]:''' Second round. Won Group D. Lost to Italy in second round. * '''[[2007 FIFA U-20 World Cup|2007]]:''' Quarterfinalist. Won Group D. Beat Uruguay in second round. Lost to Austria in quarterfinal. * '''[[2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup|2009]]:''' First round. 1-2-0 in group play. * '''[[2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup|2011]]:''' Did not qualify. == Schedule and results == {{See|2011 in American soccer}} The following is a list of matches played in the current U-20 cycle as well as any games scheduled to take place in the future. {| class="wikitable" |- !
